title: Guest Episode: Let's Talk ETFs - Building Your Own ETF Portfolio
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: With markets closed, we wanted to share another of Seeking Alpha's podcasts, specifically Let's Talk ETFs. Hosted by Jonathan Liss, an ETFs aficionado, the show goes to every corner of the ETF industry to share key trends and new ideas. This week’s episode is a special one, as Jonathan sits with a friend who recently inherited some money and was looking to build an ETF portfolio. The episode walks through that process. Have a listen, and enjoy your day off from the markets! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
